import React,{useState}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./App.css';import{ExamEngine}from'./components/ExamEngine';import{ExamFeedback}from'./components/ExamFeedback';import{ProgressDashboard}from'./components/ProgressDashboard';import{StudyMode}from'./components/StudyMode';// Import shared types
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"App-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Databricks Practice Exam"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Certified Data Engineer Associate Preparation"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"header-nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-link",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/study",className:"nav-link",children:"Study"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/exam",className:"nav-link",children:"Practice Exam"})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/exam",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExamPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/study",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StudyPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/study/:topic",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StudyTopicPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/results",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResultsPage,{})})]})})]})});}const HomePage=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const userId="demo-user-123";// In a real app, this would come from authentication
const handleStartExam=examType=>{navigate("/exam?type=".concat(examType));};const handleStudyTopic=topic=>{navigate("/study/".concat(encodeURIComponent(topic)));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProgressDashboard,{userId:userId,onStartExam:handleStartExam,onStudyTopic:handleStudyTopic})});};const ExamPage=()=>{const[examResult,setExamResult]=useState(null);const[showFeedback,setShowFeedback]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();// Get exam type from URL params
const urlParams=new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);const examType=urlParams.get('type')||'practice';const handleExamComplete=result=>{setExamResult(result);setShowFeedback(true);};const handleCloseFeedback=()=>{setShowFeedback(false);navigate('/');};const handleStartNewExam=()=>{setExamResult(null);setShowFeedback(false);// Refresh the page to start a new exam
window.location.reload();};if(showFeedback&&examResult){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExamFeedback,{examResult:examResult,onClose:handleCloseFeedback,onStartNewExam:handleStartNewExam});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"exam-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExamEngine,{userId:"demo-user-123",examType:examType,onExamComplete:handleExamComplete})});};const StudyPage=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const handleBack=()=>{navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"study-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StudyMode,{userId:"demo-user-123",onBack:handleBack})});};const StudyTopicPage=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const topic=decodeURIComponent(window.location.pathname.split('/').pop()||'');const handleBack=()=>{navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"study-topic-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StudyMode,{userId:"demo-user-123",selectedTopic:topic,onBack:handleBack})});};const ResultsPage=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"results-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"results-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Exam Results"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"This page would show historical exam results and detailed analytics."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/'),className:"back-button",children:"Back to Dashboard"})]})});};export default App;
